div.p: A value set specifies a set of codes that may be drawn from one or more code systems. Value sets don't actually define the code themselves - they just define what codes are included or excluded from the set. Value sets are defined to control what codes or concepts can be used in a particular context.
A value set resource can be automatically converted into a CTS2 value set definition in order to use a CTS2 server to provide value set functionality
